column1: One lot steals a goat from another lot, before you know it they’re ripping each other to pieces.

King of the Andals and the First Men…

with the queen and all the rest of them.

and it can never be used to hurt you.

and the Lannisters conspire against the throne,who but you can protect the king?

ah, life is full of possibilities.

my repulsive nephew will be king after him.

take the girls to their rooms.

men just stood there and watched.
